name: protvista-uniprot
description: ProtVista tool for the UniProt website

scripts.serve: npm run rollup-watch & npm run browser-sync
scripts.npm-linkall: npm link protvista-manager protvista-navigation protvista-tooltip protvista-sequence protvista-zoomable protvista-track protvista-variation protvista-variation-filter protvista-variation-graph protvista-uniprot-entry-adapter protvista-feature-adapter protvista-structure-adapter protvista-proteomics-adapter protvista-topology-adapter protvista-variation-adapter data-loader

author: Xavier Watkins <xwatkins@ebi.ac.uk>
